Kamstrup OmniPower wm-bus metering¶

This documentation covers the system to read the Kamstrup OmniPower 1-phase meter over wm-bus using a iM871-A transceiver.

Table of contents

  • Implementation of iM871-A driver
    • Generic driver class for WM-Bus USB-dongle IM871A
  • OmniPower implementation
    • Parse Kamstrup OmniPower wm-bus telegrams
    • The C1 Telegram class
    • The OmniPower class
    • Exception classes
  • Implementation of generic measurements
    • Generic class for measurements and measurement frames
    • The Measurement class
    • The MeterMeasurement class
  • Utils: CRC16 for wm-bus
    • CRC16 for wm-bus
    • CRC16 functions
    • CRC check exception
  • Utils: CRC16 for IM871-A
    • Implementation of CRC16 for IM871-A (CCITT)
    • CRC16 function
  • Utils: Timezone handling
    • Zulu timezone handling
    • ZuluTime class
    • Print datetime object with ISO 8601 format
